search_information.query_displayed: The Analysis of NLS Youth in Public and Private Schools: Response to Coleman-Hoffer. Morgan, William R. Sociology of Education

organic_results.title: The analysis of NLS youth in public and private schools: Response to Coleman-Hoffer
organic_results.snippet: I appreciated reading in the October 1983 issue of SOE that Coleman and Hoffer (hereafter, CH) were pleased with the goals of my contribution (Morgan, 1983a) to the growing literature comparing the achievements of public-and private-school youth. Moreover, since my NLS-based findings offered mostly negative support for their original conclusions regarding the superiority of private schooling, I fully expected their challenge. My surprise was that their criticisms would be premised on incorrect factual claims about my analysis …

publication_info.summary: WR Morgan - Sociology of Education, 1984 - JSTOR
